lead_paragraph: After more than 130 parents and teachers reviewed the standards, education officials proposed mostly minor changes for the state’s version of the Common Core.

headline.print_headline: Officials Propose Tweaks, Not Reboot, After Reviewing State’s School Standards
headline.main: Cuomo Called for ‘Reboot’ of School Standards. Officials Propose Tweaks Instead.

snippet: After more than 130 parents and teachers reviewed the standards, education officials proposed mostly minor changes for the state’s version of the Common Core....
abstract: New York State Education Dept proposes several tweaks to school standards but leaves broad concepts to be taught in English and math unchanged; Board of Regents is expected to consider changes in early 2017.
